name: StackHawk
description: Dynamic application security testing (DAST) — API and web app vulnerability scanning

tools: list_scans — List completed and running scans
get_scan_results — Get vulnerability findings from a scan
start_scan — Trigger a new DAST scan

setup_steps: 2. Create API key: Settings → API Keys
3. Register your application with OpenAPI/Swagger spec
4. Run initial scan to populate findings
security_notes: DAST scans make real HTTP requests — only scan applications you own
Scan triggering via AI should require human approval
API key has full account access — use a service account
Schedule scans during off-peak hours to avoid performance impact
